references.paper_title: Emergent complexity and zero-shot transfer via unsupervised environment design
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Unsupervised Environment Design (UED), a core paradigm of the current work.
This paper introduces the diffusion probabilistic models which is leveraged for efficient data generation in the current work.

references.paper_title: High-dimensional continuous control using generalized advantage estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces the Generalized Advantage Estimation, which is used as an approximation of the regret value in the current work.
This paper introduces the Proximal Policy Optimization algorithm which is used to train the student agent in the current work.
This paper introduces the Deterministic Policy Gradient algorithm which is used to train the teacher agent in the current work.
